GSP33nysu__3u:2621: yadiṣyasādhanaṃ na bhavati tatstanapānaṃ na bhavati,

GSP33nysu__3u:2651: yadaivametaddehavartino mama na kevalamayameva dehaḥ kintu tatprāganyo 'pyabhūditi dehāntarasmaraṇaṃ pramitam(ṇamāpatitam) /
GSP33nysu__3u:2653: kintvanekamaṇiṣvanusyūtaṃ sūtramivānekadehānusyūtamātmānaṃ paśyataḥ svasya tato 'tyantabhedāvasitireva yuktā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2657: ato mama deha iti pratyayo nānyathayitavyaḥ kṛṣṇo 'hamityādiścopacāro 'ṅgīkaraṇīya iti /

GSP33nysu__3u:2667: dehānukūlapratikūlārthayo rāgadveṣau ca dehātmabhedajñāne sati na syātām /

GSP33nysu__3u:2690: ātmano dehe vyāptatvādatyantaṃ premāspadatvādrāgādayo yujyanta eveti /

GSP33nysu__3u:2700: yamalayoratyantavivekaṃ paśyanto 'pi mātrādayaḥ kathametau viviktāvavagantavyāviti pṛṣṭā evamiti svapratyakṣānubhavānusāreṇa na parānpratipādayituṃ kṣamanta ityādyanubhavasiddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:2702: atha tatrātyantasādṛśyaṃ pratibandhakaṃ tarhyatrāpyaṅgāravahnivadātmano dehe vyāptatvaṃ pratibandhakamuktameva /

GSP33nysu__3u:2723: tasya vartamānamātragrāhitvena āgāminamapi viśvasya bādhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pratikṣipet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2730: tathā satīdānīntanaghaṭābhāvagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa bhaviṣyati ghaṭa ityāgamādervirodhaḥ syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2733: asti tāvat pratyakṣaṃ vartamānakālīnaṃ bādhābhāvamāvedayatīti parasyāpi sampratipattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2734: āgamaśca neha nānāstītyādirūpo vartamānameva viśvasya bādhaṃ pratipādayatīti kathaṃ na pratyakṣaviruddhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2736: sa ca vartamānakālīnasattāgrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viruddhayata eveti tatpratipādakasyāgamādeḥ kathaṃ na pratyakṣavirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2737: etenāsmatpratyakṣamasmanniṣṭhameva bādhaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ kṣamate na puruṣāntaragatamiti nirastam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2762: bhaviṣyati mokṣa ityavagamābhāve ca tadarthaḥ prayatno na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2763: mokṣe sarvasya bādho bhaviṣyatītyetadapi na syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:2765: śukavāmadevādayo jñānena muktā abhūvannahamapi mukto bhaviṣyāmītyādyavagatiḥ āgamādeva bhaviṣya(tīti)
GSP33nysu__3u:2767: āgamo 'pi hi sāmānye siddhe pratyakṣataḥ punaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2776: nadyāstīre pañcaphalāni santītyādau tathā darśanāditi hiśabdārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2780: yadi padārthāḥ prāṅ na siddhāstarhi padānāṃ teṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahaṇaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2785: atha śaktigraha eva kimartha ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2787: viśeṣaṃ jñāpayed vākyaṃ na tadajñātaśaktike // MAnuv_3,2.70 //
GSP33nysu__3u:2790: akhilamapi vākyaṃ padānāṃ padārtheṣu vācakatvaśaktigrahe jāta evānvayaviśeṣaṃ gamayet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2791: natu tadvākyaṃ padārtheṣu padasamūhe 'jñātaśaktike sati viśeṣaṃ gamayedityanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ,
GSP33nysu__3u:2796: astu śaktigrahāvaśyambhāvaḥ kintu vartamāneṣvevārtheṣu nātītānāgateṣvanupayogādityata āha- śaktiścediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2800: yadi vartamāna evārthe padānāṃ śaktirgṛhītā syāttadā vākyam atītānāgatam atītānāgatārthasaṃsargaṃ na vadet na pratipādayet /

GSP33nysu__3u:2809: vartamānādanyatrātītānāgatayorapi padaśaktigraho yadyaṅgīkṛtastadā saḥ atītānāgatārtheṣu padaśaktigrahastadagrahe 'tītānāgatārthāgrahe kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2814: vākyaṃ tāvatpadārthasaṃsargaviśeṣalakṣaṇaṃ vākyārthameva bodhayati na padārthamātram /
GSP33nysu__3u:2820: śukavāmadevedayo muktā abhūvannahaṃ ca mukto bhaviṣyāmītyādikaṃ ca tathā /
GSP33nysu__3u:2822: naca tatsākṣiṇā vinā bhavatīti kathamatītānāgatārthagrāhiṇastasya vartamānamātraviṣayatvamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2830: tatra sāmānyākāra eva śabdavācyo viśeṣastu lakṣya eveti tāvanniṣyaṅkitam /

GSP33nysu__3u:2835: viśeṣāṇāṃ hi śabdavācyatve teṣāmatītādirūpatvāt śaktigrahaṇāyātītādijñānamapekṣitaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2845: nugataṃ nityaṃ gotvādisāmānyameva gavādiśabdavācvatvaṃ sāsnādimanto viśeṣāstu lakṣyā eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:2861: nahi sāsnādimati piṇḍe vatarmānaṃ paśutvaṃ gośabdavācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2869: tathātve darśanabhedāsambhavāditi vaiyātyādvadantaṃ pratyāha- svarūpaṃ cediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2870: svarūpaṃ cedanugataṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tatra kiṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,2.73cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2875: evaṃ satyatva praśno niruttaraḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2883: tasmātkiṃ tatra vyāvṛttamiti praśne kṛte svarūpatvamityevottaraṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2885: dravyeṣvatyantaṃ vyāvṛttā dharmā antyā viśeṣā iti vaiśeṣikairaṅgīkṛtam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2887_0: tatra yathā svarūpatvameva vyāvṛttaṃ tathā dravyeṣvapi tadevāstu kiṃ viśeṣairiti
GSP33nysu__3u:2887_1: viśeṣānavajñāya tatsthāne svarūpatvamabhiṣiñcatā mīmāṃsakena kiṃ vyāvṛttamiti praśne
GSP33nysu__3u:2887_2: 'ntyā viśeṣā iti vaktuṃ na śakyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:2891: tasya cedānīmanugatatvāṅgīkāre kathamayaṃ praśno niruttaro na bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2903: naca vācakaḥ śabdaḥ śaktigrahaṇe vinār'thaṃ bodhayatīti tatra tasya śaktigraho 'pyeṣyavya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2904: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- evamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2908_0: evamuktaprakāreṇa vyāvṛttarūpe nissāmānye 'pi svarūpe vā bhede vā svarūpabhedādiśabdānāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:2908_1: vācakatvaśaktigraho yadāṅgīkṛto bhavettadā sa ca śaktigrahastasya svarūpāderjñānaṃ vinā kuto bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:2910: sarveṣāṃ svarūpāṇāṃ bhedānāṃ ca jñāne(ca) sārvajñamāpatitamityata āha- sāmānyata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2911: ... sāmānyato jñānaṃ vinā sa ca bhavet kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.75cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2913: sāmānyato jñānenaiva vyutpattyupapattiḥ, viśeṣato jñānābhāvācca sārvajñānāpattirityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2914: nanu sāmānyavarjitasya svarūpādeḥ kathaṃ sāmānyato jñānamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2917: sarvamapi vastvasmābhirviśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ vyāvṛttarūpaṃ sāmānyarūpaṃ ceṣyate 'to na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2920: yadi vyāvṛttameva syāttadoktaprakāreṇa sārvajñamāpadyeta śaktigrahābhāvo vā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2924: yāvatā prāk svarūpādikaṃ nissāmānyameveti prasādhyedānīṃ sarvamapi viśeṣasāmānyarūpamiṣyata ityucyata ityata āha- vyāvṛttamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2925: vyāvṛttaṃ yacca sāmānyaṃ tadeva syād viśeṣataḥ // MAnuv_3,2.76cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:2928: yadeva vyāvṛttaṃ svarūpaṃ tadeva viśeṣabalena sāmānyaṃ ca syādyatastena kāraṇena padārthānāṃ parasparamekadharmatā nāstīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:2930: yatprāk svarūpabhedādau sāmānyaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ tatpadārthasvarūpāṇāṃ parasparamanugataikadharmatā nāstītyabhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33nysu__3u:2932: svarūpābhinnasya pratiniyatasya sāmānyākārasyābhyupagame viśeṣasāmānyarūpaṃ sarvamapīṣyata ityuktamiti na pūrvottaravirodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2950: rūpādayo 'pi dharmā anuvṛttā eva na tu prativyakti bhidyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2957: śauklayamidaṃ śauklayamidamiti pratītau himaśauklayasādṛśyameva himāṃśuśauklaye pratīyate natu tenaikyamityato na virodhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:2958: mā bhūdanugataṃ sāmānyaṃ tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- ata iti //

GSP33nysu__3u:2965: tacca sākṣiṇeti kuta ityata āha- sarvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:2972: atītānāgatavartamānaṃ sarvamapi liṅgamanena sādhyena vyāptamiti jñānāpekṣaṃ khalvanumānam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2975: atītādikaṃ sarvaṃ dhūmādi tathāvidhenāgnyādinā vyāptamiti jñānapūrvakaṃ khalvanumānam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2979: śaktigrahaścārthagrahāpekṣa iti sarveṣāṃ sāmānyataḥ sarvamiti jñānamaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__3u:2982: nanvanugatasāmānyābhāve vyaktīnāmānantyādvayabhicārācca śabdaśaktigraha eva na saṅgacchate /
GSP33nysu__3u:2989: nanvevaṃ sati gośabdasya gavaye 'pi śaktiṃ gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:2999: evaṃ sākṣipratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitvamapākṛtya mānasapratyakṣasyāpi tadapākaroti- pratyakṣamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3004: pūrvānubhavānadhikaviṣayāyāḥ smṛteḥ prāmāṇyameva durlabhaṃ kuto mānasapratyakṣajatvamityata āha- (yadeti)tadeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3008: yadā yasmāt atītatvaviśeṣitam arthaṃ smṛtirviṣayīkarotīti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3010: atītatvaviśeṣitārthaviṣayatve 'pi kathaṃ smṛteḥ pramāṇatvamityata āha- ādhikyamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3012: mānatā ca kathaṃ na syāt smṛter ... // MAnuv_3,2.81a-d //
GSP33nysu__3u:3014: yasmātsmṛtiviṣayīkṛtamatītatvaṃ vartamānatayānubhūtārthādadhikyamiṣyate sarvaistasmātsmṛtermānatā kathaṃ na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3015: mānatve ca mānasapratyakṣajatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāditi cārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3024: cākṣuṣādipratyakṣe 'pi na vartamānamātragrāhitvaniyama iti bhāvenāha- mānatvamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3028: tataḥ kiṃ prakṛta ityata āha- atīteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3034: sā ca cakṣurādinaiva jāyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3038: anubhava eveti vā smṛtireveti vā smṛtyanubhavarūpaṃ jñānadvayamiti caikameva jñānamaṃśe smṛtiraṃśe 'nubhava iti veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3040: tathātve hyahamityeva syānna tu sa iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3042: tathā sati sa ityeva syānna tvayamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3045: tathāca sa ityaṃśasya smṛtitvānna cākṣuṣādipratyakṣasyātītaviṣayatvamityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3049: smṛtimātrā smṛtimātrārdhaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā smṛtyanubhavarūpaikadeśasamudāyarūpā tathā smṛtyanubhavātmakaikajñānarūpā ca netyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3064: tasmādanubhavarūpamekameva vijñānaṃ saṃskārasacivena cakṣurādinā jātatvātsoyamityākāraṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:3067: tathā saṃskārasacivānāmindriyāṇāṃ pratyabhijñāhetutvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ko doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3071: ato na vatarmānaikaniyamaḥ syād grahe 'kṣaje // MAnuv_3,2.83cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:3075: pramāṇaprameyapramātṛbhedaṃ viśvamabādhyamiti yaduktaṃ tadupasaṃhariṣyannarthagatāyā jñā(tatāyāḥ prākaṭyāparaparyāyā)
GSP33nysu__3u:3076: tattāprākaṭyasamākhyāyāḥ pramiteścaturthyā vidyamānatvātkathaṃ trividhaṃ viśvamityāśaṅkāṃ tāvatpariharati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3091: yatra jñāne yo 'rtho 'vabhāsate ta(trāsau)syāsau viṣaya ityatra saptamyarthānupapattiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3092: tasmādyena yasyātiśaya utpadyate tasyāsau viṣaya ityaṅgīkāryam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3093: tathā cārthasya viṣayatvasiddhaye jñānajanyo 'rthagato 'tiśayaḥ sarvathāṅgīkārya iti kathaṃ mānābhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3096: na hyasati dharmiṇi tatra dharmotpattiḥ sambhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:3097: atha karaṇasambhavāttatra viṣayatvamityucyate tarhi vartamāne 'pi tathā sambhavānna jñātatā kalpanīyeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3100: kiñca jñānaṃ svaviṣaye jñātatāmupajanayati yatra kvacidvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:3103: api ca jñātatāyāmapi jñātatotpādo 'ṅgīkriyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:3105: ādye 'nubhavānārūḍhaṃ jñātatāpravāhamaṅgīkurvāṇasya kalpanāgauravaṃ syādityāha- kalpanāyā gauravācceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3106: atha jñātatā jñātatāntaramantareṇaiva viṣaya iti kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3108: etena jñānaṃ svaviṣaye kiñcitkaroti kriyātvādgamanavadityanumānamapi nirastam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3112: nanu jñāto ghaṭaḥ prakaṭo ghaṭa ityarthaviśeṣaṇatayā jñātatā pratyakṣamīkṣyata ityata āha- mayeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3118: kriyā hi kartṛsthaiva yadā kartṛprādhānyena vyavahriyate tadā kartṛdharmatayā pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3129: tathā sati jñāsyāmītyeva(meva) syānna tu jānāmīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3133: tato jñātatālakṣaṇakāryeṇaivānumātavyamiti kathaṃ sā nābhyupagamyata ityata uktam- sākṣiṇamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3139: prathamajñāne hi śuddha evārtho jñāyate na jñātatāviśiṣyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3143: jñāta ityatra tu jñānaṃ viṣaya ityuktameveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3148: tattasmānmānādibhedena trividhameva viśvaṃ tasya kvacidapyucchittirbādho nā(stī)styevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3151: svapnānāmapi caiteṣāṃ na bādho dṛśyate kvacit // MAnuv_3,2.86cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:3155: ṣāṃ mānamātṛprameyāṇāṃ kvacitkāle na bādho dṛśyate ataḥ svapno mithyā naiveti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3157: svapnādutthitasya nātra gajo 'bhūdityādinā bādhadarśanātkathametadityata āha- jāgrattvamātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3166: nanu svāpnapadārthānāṃ jāgrattvaṃ yadi bhramasiddhaṃ bādhitaṃ ca tadā teṣāṃ mithyātvamavarjanīyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3167: svāpnagajādayo mithyā bhramaviṣayatvādbādhaviṣayatvācca śaktirajatavadityanumānāditi cetkimidaṃ bhramaviṣayatvamāropyatayā vā'ropādhiṣṭhānatayā vā sādhāraṇaṃ vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:3173: yathā śuktikāderāropabādhādhiṣṭhānatve 'pi na mithyātvaṃ tathā svāpnānāmapītyanaikāntyamityarthaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:3202: jāgrattvādeḥ rajatatvādeśca bādhāduttaramapyabādhitatvena gajādeḥ śuktyādeścānuvṛtteḥ svapnāderuktavidhā bhrāntatā bādhyatā ca kutaḥ /

GSP33nysu__3u:3220: kiñca bhrāntatvavādī sa bhrāntatvaṃ svamatasya ca /

GSP33nysu__3u:3273: tatra jaivī prajñā kīdṛśaṃ kāraṇamityata āha- upādānameveti //

GSP33nysu__3u:3309: atha prajñāyā vāsanāyāśca kaḥ sambandho yena lakṣaṇā syādityata āha- prajñātmakamiti //

GSP33nysu__3u:3324: yadi ca vāsanāmātramiti mukhya eva prayogaḥ kriyeta tadeśvaraprajñā na saṅgṛhītā syātpṛthagubhayagrahaṇe ca gauravaṃ syāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:3426: svatantro 'pīśvaro līlayā tāni kāraṇānyupādāya jīvaṃ tadvaśatāṃ nītvā suṣuptyādikaṃ prāpayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3433: // oṃ sa eva ca karmānusmṛtiśabdavidhibhyaḥ oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3436: sa evottiṣṭhatyutānyo 'pīti saṃśaye mahājalanidhau kṣiptasyodabindoriva brahmaṇaikībhūtasyoddharaṇāsambhavādaniyama iti prāpte samādhīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3445: svapnādīnāṃ parameśvarakṛtatve 'bhihite kiṃ deśakālāntare 'nyo 'pi kartāstyuteśvara eveti saṃśaye laukikeśvarāṇāṃ deśakālavyavasthayaiśvaryadarśanādayamapi tathāvidha iti prāpte /
GSP33nysu__3u:3446: sa eveśvaro 'sya svapnādeḥ kartā natu deśakālāntare 'nyaḥ kaścanetyeṣa evārtho 'tra pratipādyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3447: nahi yaḥ suptaḥ sa evottiṣṭhatyanyo veti kasyacitsaṃśayo 'sti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3448: naca suptasya brahmaṇaikyaṃ pramāṇadṛṣṭamiṣyaṃ vā parasyeti yatkiñcidetat /
GSP33nysu__3u:3450: sūtrakṛtā ca svapnādivanna mohaḥ svatantrāvastheti jñāpanāya vyavadhānaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3456: // oṃ na sthānato 'pi parasyobhayaliṅgaṃ sarvatra hi oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3458: dvirūpaṃ brahma śrūyate sarvakarmā sarvakāma ityādau saviśeṣamasthūlamanaṇvityādau nirviśeṣam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3461: kiṃ saviśeṣamuta nirviśeṣamiti saṃśaye dvividhaśrutyanurodhādubhayarūpameva brahmeti prāpte idamucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3462: na tāvatsvata eva parasya brahmaṇa ubhayarūpatvaṃ sambhavati virodhāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3473: neha nānāsti kiñcanetyādau bhedadarśananindāpūrvakamabhedameke śākhinaḥ samāmanantīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3474: tadidaṃ vyākhyānaṃ samyagvyākhyānenaivāpahastitaṃ bhaviṣyati kiṃ punaḥ prayatnenetyāśayavānvyākhyānamevārabhate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3478: tatra sarvatra sthitaḥ kimeka evota parasparaṃ bhinna iti saṃśaye yadyugapadbhinnasthānaṃ tadbhinnaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33nysu__3u:3481: bhinnānāṃ ca tāratamyamanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaścopalabdha iti tatprasaṅgo 'pīti kathaṃ sa eva cetyuktamiti prāpte prativihitaṃ sūtrakṛtā na sthānato 'pīti /

GSP33nysu__3u:3491_1: sthitasya pareśituḥ kaścit anyonyābhāvalakṣaṇo hīnādhikatvarūpo 'nugrāhyānugrāhakatvarūpo vā, bhedo nāsti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3492: kuta ityataḥ sarvatra hītyuktaṃ vyācaṣṭe- sarvatreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3502: “sarveṣu bhūteṣvetameva brahmetyācakṣate'; ityādau paramātmā śrūyate yata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:3504: oṃ na bhedāditi cenna pratyekamatadvacanāt oṃ //

GSP33nysu__3u:3521: sakalasmṛtītihāsapurāṇānāṃ parameśvarasyāśeṣadoṣadūratve samastaguṇaparipūrṇatve ca yanmahātātparyaṃ tadvirodhena tat vākyaṃ atra bhagavato doṣitvādau kathaṃ mānaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3528: yadi parameśvarasya sakalaguṇaparipūrṇatve nirastasamastadoṣatve ca vedādīnāṃ mahātātparyamityarthaḥ pramāṇavānsyāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:3529: tadeva tu na paśyāma ityata āha- duḥkheti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3543: tatra yadā viṣayaḥ sandigdhaḥ prayojanaṃ ca niścitaṃ tadā,
GSP33nysu__3u:3547: tathāca tatprayojanaṃ yasminjñāpite sampadyate sa eva viṣayo 'vadhāryate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3552: ataḥ sa eva viṣayaḥ kalpanīyo yasminjñā(pi)te mokṣādikaṃ sampa(dyata iti)dyeteti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3560: astu tarhi sa eva viṣayaḥ kiṃ guṇapūrṇatvādinetyata uktaṃ prasannādeva nānyathā na jñātamātrāditi /

GSP33nysu__3u:3591: “kiṃ mām'; ityanena“abhī'; idamekameka asmi niṣṣāḷabhī dvā kimau trayaḥ karanti /

GSP33nysu__3u:3593: idamekaṃ viśvaṃ abhi prati ahameko niṣpaḷasmi nitarāṃ sahata iti niṣpāṭ dvau prapañcāvabhi prati ahameko niṣṣāḷasmi /
GSP33nysu__3u:3594: trayo 'pi prapañcā mama kimeva kurvanti na kimapi mamāniṣyaṃ kartumīśate /

GSP33nysu__3u:3606: lokataśca prasādena muktiḥ sa guṇavedanāt // MAnuv_3,2.110ab //

GSP33nysu__3u:3657: // oṃ ata eva copamā sūryakādivat oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:3663: yo yadaṃśaḥ sa tadabhinno yatheśvarāṃśā matsyādistadabhinna iti /

GSP33nysu__3u:3665: tadetaddṛṣṭāntavacanamātraṃ na kasyacidarthasya sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vetyataḥ pūvarpakṣaniṣedhapūrvakaṃ pratijñāhetū darśayati- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3679: jīvo brahmābhinno na bhavati tadābhāsatvādyo yadābhāso nāsau tadabhinno yathāsūryakādiḥ sūryādinetyanumānavirodhāt /

GSP33nysu__3u:3697: ca sākṣātkintu pāramparyeṇeti svarūpakathanāya śrutidvayaṃ paṭhati- chāyā viṣṇoriti //

GSP33nysu__3u:3729: yajjīvasya paramātmana ābhāsatvaṃ śrutibalena nirṇītaṃ tadyuktiviruddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:3738: tathāpi kuto na yuktamityata āha- upādhīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3749: darpaṇādinā sannikṛṣṭāḥ pratihatāḥ parāvṛttā nāyanaraśmayo mukhena sannikṛṣṭāstadeva viṣayīkurvanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:3751: tatra vyavacchedaḥ parāktvaṃ savyetaravyatyāsaścetyādikaṃ bhrāntyaiva pratīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3752: sopādhikaścāyaṃ bhrama iti yāvadupādhibhāvaṃ na nivartate /
GSP33nysu__3u:3756: evamābhāsatvānumāne duṣye kim iti cennirābādhena prāguktānumānadvayenaikyaṃ siddhamityāha- cetanatveneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3761: aikyaṃ ca sādhyamānaṃ na māyāvādināmivetyuktam- samudāyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3765: atyantābhedaṃ parityajya samudāyaikyaṃ kuto 'ṅgīkriyata ityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:3769: samudāyaikyāṅgīkārato yacchatyādyuktaṃ pṛthaktvaṃ tatsamudāyasya tadaṃśasya ca jīvasya bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:3772: yadi jīvasya brahmaṇātyantābhedaḥ sā(dhyeta)dhyate tadā bhedaśrutaya uparudhyeran /

GSP33nysu__3u:4647: īśvara eva hi viśvasya sṛṣṭisaṃhārayoḥ kartā nānya ityabhyupagatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4648: tathāca sṛṣṭvā yāvanna saṃharettāvatsthitiḥ svabhāvasiddhaiva na paravyāpāramapekṣate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4649: yadi khalu sṛṣṭisaṃhārayoḥ kartā'nyaḥ syāttadodāsīnasya tasya sṛṣṭau preraṇādyarthaṃ saṃhāre pravṛttasya nivāraṇārthaṃ ca sthitāvīśvarāpekṣā sambhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:4651: ataḥ saṃhārodāsīnatvātiriktaṃ pālakatvaṃ nopapadyata ityevamatra pūrvapakṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4658: parānapekṣatayā pratīyamānaṃ svarūpaṃ dharmo vā svabhāva ityucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4672: tadetadubhayaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkaya ato 'nantena tathā hi liṅgamiti sūtritam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4673: atra virodhaśāntirna sphuṭā pratīyata ityatastasya tātparyamāha- avyakto 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4675: avyakto 'pi svaktayaiva bhaktānāṃ dṛśyate hariḥ // MAnuv_3,2.157cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:4683: yadīśvarasya guṇakriyādayo dharmāstato bhinnāstadā samavāyasya nirākṛtatvāttadvattvamanupapannam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4694: pārameśvarāḥ sarve guṇā dharmā nityaṃ tadabhinnāstenātyantābhinnastathāpi viśeṣaśaktyā guṇaguṇyādibhāvena sthitāḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4699: guṇānāṃ cāsrākṣītsṛjati srakṣyati vyajñāsījjānāti jñāsyatītyādi śrautavyavahārairanityatayāvagatānāṃ tu na yujyata ityata āha- viśeṣātmatayeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4704: teṣāṃ parameśvarasambandhinyāṃ kriyādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ nityaśaktyātmanā nityaṃ sthitestathā viśeṣātmatayā vyaktirūpeṇa vyavahāraviṣayatopapatternānityateti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:4706: nanu ca kriyādīnāṃ yā vyaktatā sā tāvadanityaiva /
GSP33nysu__3u:4708: tatastasyā bhagavaddharmabhūtāyā api nātyantābhedopapattirityata āha- na viśeṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4718: nanvevaṃ tarhi śaktirvyaktirita vyavahāraviśeṣo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4719: uktavyavahārāṇāṃ nirālambanatvaṃ ca na parihṛtaṃ syādityata āha- saviśeṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4726: yadyayaṃ sarvanirvāhaheturviśeṣo bhagavato bhinnastadā sarveṣāṃ taddharmāṇāṃ tenātyantābheda iti pratijñā bhajyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:4728: svarupamātraparyavasānena so 'pi na syādityata āha- viśeṣa iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4733: ayaṃ viśeṣo 'pi bhagavatā naiva bhinnastena na pratijñāhāniḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4746: naca tatpaśyāma ityataḥ sautramubhayavyapadeśāditi hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe- viśeṣatveneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4749: akhilaiḥ ubhayavidhaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ vedavākyairjñānādidharmāṇāṃ bhagavadviśeṣatvenāpiśabdāttadabhinnatvena ca vijñātervijñānādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4755: śrutyaiva sa sa eveti tadabhedaśca gamyate // MAnuv_3,2.162 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4759: sa ānandādiḥ saḥ paramātmaivetyanena“ānando brahma'; ityādiśrutim /
GSP33nysu__3u:4766: ityādiśrutyā sarjanādikaṃ brahmaṇo viśeṣo 'tiśayo na brahmamātramityavagamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4769: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma ekadhaivānudraṣṭavyam'; ityādiśrutyaiva tasya tenābhedaścāvagamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4772: kriyādīnāṃ nityatā śaktivyaktirūpatā vyaktirūpasyāpi nityatā śaktirūpapābhinnatā saviśeṣatā viśeṣasyāpyabhedaḥ svanirvāhakatā ceti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4780: samavāyābhāve 'pi vā dharmadharmiṇoreva sa ko 'pi mahimā kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4784: apara āha akhaṇḍameva brahma na tu tatra kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4788: ānandaṃ ityādīnāṃ ca rāhoḥ śira ityādivadupacaritatvopapatteriti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4792: tato varamādita eva tadaṅgīkaraṇamityāśayavānbhedavādinaṃ tāvadviśeṣamaṅgīkārayitumāha- bheda iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4793: bhedo yadi viśeṣasya sa bhedo bhedinā katham // MAnuv_3,2.163ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4795: viśeṣasya jñānāderbrahmadharmasya, yadi brahmaṇo bhedo 'ṅgīkriyate tadā pṛcchāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4796: sa bhedo, bhedinā brahmaṇā jñānādinā ca saha, kathaṃ kiṃ prakāraḥ, pratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4801: yadi bhedo bhedibhyāṃ bhinnastadā so 'pi bhedastathetyanavasthā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4806: abhinnatve 'pi vaktavyaṃ saviśeṣābhinna uta nirviśeṣābhinna iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4812: bheda iva vināpi bhedena viśeṣeṇaivopapattāvapi vṛthā paramparākalpanāyāṃ gauravaṃ syāttato dharmāṇāmeva saviśeṣābhedāṅgīkāraḥ śreyāniti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4823: bhedo yadi bhedibhyāmabhinno nirviśeṣaśca syāttadā tasya tadbhedatā tayorayaṃ bheda ityevambhāvaḥ kuto na kuto 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4825: tanmātratve ca dharmadharmiṇāveva sto na bheda iti syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4827: bheda evāsti na dharmadharmiṇāviti vā bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:4830: bhedasya bhedisvarūpatvamaṅgīkṛtya viśeṣamanaṅgīkurvāṇaṃ prati dūṣaṇāntaramāha- aneneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4832: bheda evaiṣa bahudhā dṛśyate tat kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,2.165 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4835: bhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa iti sa bheda eva viśeṣato viśeṣaṇatvena dṛśyate na tu ghaṭaḥ, kintu viśeṣyatvena /
GSP33nysu__3u:4839: paṭādbhinnastambhādbhinno ghaṭa ityeṣa bheda eva saviśeṣaḥ pratiyogiviśeṣasāhityena dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4840: tathāyaṃ padārtho 'nena vakratvenānena koṭaravattvena puruṣādbhinna iti sa eṣa bheda eva viśeṣato vyāvartakadharmeṇa dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4842: tathāsmātpaṭādasmātstambhādasmātkuḍyādbhinno 'yaṃ ghaṭa ityeṣa bheda eva saviśeṣataḥ pratiyogiviśeṣasāhityena nimittena bahudhā dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4844: ato na bhedo ghaṭasya svarūpamiti yatsvarūpabhedasya dūṣaṇaṃ parairucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4845: tattasya kimuttaraṃ tvayābhidhāsyate, yadi viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyate, ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4846: yadi viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyate tadā bhedo bhedinābhinna ityapi nāṅgīkartuṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4848: viśeṣaṇaiva hi teṣāmanyathāsiddhiṃ vyutpādya pratītibalena bhedasya bhedinābhedo vaktavyo nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4850: tadīyatvena viśeṣaṇatvena sapratiyogitvena liṅgitvena bahutvena ca pratīyamāno 'nyonyābhāvādirūpo bhedo na bhedisvarūpatayāṅgīkriyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4851: yastu svarūpatayāṅgīkriyate nāsau tadīyatvādinā pratīyata iti tasyottaraṃ brūma iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:4853: anyathā svarūpasyaiva bheda iti pāribhāṣikaṃ nāmāntaramuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4881: abhedabhedaśabdau ca paryāyāviti ko vadet // MAnuv_3,2.167ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:4884: pratyutāparyāyāvityeva vadati sarva ityaprāmāṇikaṃ pramāṇaviruddhaṃ caitaditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:4887: tathāca bhedābhedaśabdayoḥ paryāyatvaprāptau viśeṣabalenaiva hi tatpariharaṇīyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4896: yadyapi bhedābhedayoḥ bhedinā ghaṭena sahābhedastathāpi tayoranyonyaṃ bhedo 'stīti na tacchabdayoḥ paryāyatvaṃ prasajyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4906: viśeṣābhāve bhedo bhedinā eko 'bhinnastathābhidā bhedinā ghaṭenābhinnā,
GSP33nysu__3u:4912: nirvāhārthaṃ ghaṭena saviśeṣa evābhedo 'ṅgīkārya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4923: tathāca bhedābhedayorghaṭatanmātratvābhāvena parasparaṃ bhedopapatterna śabdayoḥ paryāyatvam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4924: tataśca bhedābhedayoḥ parasparamabhedo viśeṣaścāṅgīkāyar ityasaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:4925: evamapi dharmadharmiṇorbhedamabhyupagacchatāntato 'bhinne vastuni viśeṣo 'ṅgīrktavya ityabhimataṃ yadyapi siddhameva,
GSP33nysu__3u:4933: kalpanāgauravāyaiva kiṃ bhedaḥ kalpyate tadā // MAnuv_3,2.170 //
GSP33nysu__3u:4936: bhedābhedayorghaṭeneva parasparamapi saviśeṣatvenaiva sarvasyopapattau bhedakalpane kalpanāgauravaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4938: astvevaṃ tataḥ kimāyātaṃ prakṛta ityata āha- viśeṣeṇaiveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4940: ghaṭenābhede 'pyaparyāyaśabdavyavahṛtiryadi viśeṣeṇaiva bhavet tadā dharmadhamirṇorapi bhedaḥ kiṃ kalpanāgauravāyaiva kalpyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:4941: dharmadhamirṇorbhedamaṅgīkṛtyāpyantato viśeṣo 'ṅgīkāryaḥ tato varamādita eva tadaṅgīkaraṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:4942: anyathā kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāditi / etena purā na kimitivivṛtaṃ bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:4947: tathāca bheda eva jagati na syādityata āha- aikyeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:4953: aikyapratītyabhāve 'pi kuto viśeṣo nāṅgīkriyata ityata āha- sa eveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:4954: sa eveti pratītau hi viśeṣo nāma bhaṇyate // MAnuv_3,2.171cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:4974: tathāpi“satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma'; ityādīni tāvatsatyaviṣayāṇi pareṇāṅgīkṛtānyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:4987: satyādipadānāṃ vidhivācitve vidhīyamānānāṃ satyatvādiviśeṣaṇānāṃ brahmaṇyabhāvāt svarūpamātrasya caikatvātparyāyatvaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:4991: santi hi nāsti brahma, sadapi na jñānaṃ paricchinnaṃ (ce)vetyādipratītayaḥ prāṇinām /
GSP33nysu__3u:4995: brahmaṇi tu lakṣaṇayā pravartanta iti na tatra viśeṣaṇāni samarpayanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5000: śabale gṛhītasaṅgatikānāṃ satyabrahmalakṣakatvopapatteḥ / ato na paryāyatvaṃ nāpi vaiyarthyamiti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5018: na hyāropitena rūpeṇa gaganasya nīrūpatā vihanyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5023: evaṃ tarhi na ko 'pi vākyārtho vyavasthitaḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:5029: yadvā pratītā sā ca svābhāvavyāvartakatvenaiva vyavatiṣṭhate na brahmaviṣayatvena /
GSP33nysu__3u:5032: sāpi tathā cet anavasthitiḥ brahmajñānasyāvyavasthaiveti parihārārthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5033: na kevalaṃ brahmaṇo nirviśeṣatve padānāṃ paunaruktyādi(kaṃ)
GSP33nysu__3u:5034: kinnāmaikasyāpi padasya tatra pravṛttirna bhavedityāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5035: yadi satye viśeṣo na na taduktirbhavet tadā // MAnuv_3,2.174ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:5042: syādayaṃ doṣo yadi brahma śabdābhidheyaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:5055: nanu lakṣyatvamapi brahmaṇo nāstyeva lakṣyamityapi lakṣaṇayaivocyate nābhidhānavṛttyeti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:5069: “neha nānāsti'; iti śrutiḥ“iha bhūtale ghaṭo nāsti'; itivadabhāvaṃ brahmaṇyaṅgīkarotyeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:5093: tataśca satyajñānādivākyaṃ tattvāvedakaṃ sārvajñādivākyaṃ māyāśabalaparamiti vibhāgo na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5094: mā bhūdayaṃ vibhāgo 'sārvajñādyabhāvo 'pi brahmaṇyaṅgīkriyata evetyata āha- tadeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5099: dvau nañau prakṛtamarthaṃ sātiśayaṃ gamayata iti nyāyādityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5105: sarvajñādipadaṃ brahmaṇi śrūyamāṇamasārvajñādinivṛttiṃ bodhayatītyetādṛśaṃ prameyaṃ yadi na grāhyaṃ tadā'nandapadamapyasukhatvaṃ na nivartayet,
GSP33nysu__3u:5120: tānyapi cenna tadvayāvartayanti tadā brahmaṇo 'sattvādikaṃ tāttvikamevetyāpannamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5121: yadvā yadi naitādṛśamityadhyāhāreṇa vinaikameva vākyaṃ buddhayā vivicya tu yojyamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5132: satyatvādiviśe(ṣaṇānāṃ)ṣāṇāṃ cānṛtatvādivirodhitvaṃ suprasiddhamiti kathaṃ na tadvayāvṛttiriti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5147: mahādareṇa śirasi viśeṣo dhārya eva hi // MAnuv_3,2.180 //
GSP33nysu__3u:5149: yasmādevamakhaṇḍavādibhyāṃ viśeṣo 'ṅgīkāryastattasmādeva hi khaṇḍākhaḍena khaṇḍākhaṇḍavādinā ca viśeṣo 'ṅgīkārya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:5150: kuntāḥ praviśantītivadupalakṣaṇayā arśaādibhyo 'jiti vā khaṇḍākhaṇḍeneti sādhu /
GSP33nysu__3u:5152: dharmadharmiṇorbhedābhedāviti vadatā tau kiṃ tābhyāmatyantaṃ bhinnāvaṅgīkriyete utātyantābhinnāvatha bhinnābhinnau /
GSP33nysu__3u:5170: prakāśaśca dravyāntaraṃ na sūryābhinna ityataḥ prakāśāśrayavadveti nidarśanamapi nātyantābhedopayuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:5171: kālasya pūrvatvaṃ nāma pradhvastakriyāsambandha iti na pūrvavadvetyapi prakṛtānuguṇamityata āha- nidarśaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5175: yata evamarthāpattyā bhagavadguṇānāṃ bhagavatā saviśeṣo 'tyantābhedaḥ siddho 'tra ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5183: nanvekenaiva nidarśanenālaṃ kiṃ trayeṇetyata uktam- ādareṇeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5188: tasmādeva bhagavaddharmāṇāṃ bhagavatā saviśeṣābhedasya samarthitatvādeva padābhihitaiḥ padārthairanvayabodha ityetanmataṃ neti labhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5208: satyaṃ jñānamanantaṃ brahma yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavidityādibrahmapratipādakavākyagatāni sakalānyapi padānyanvitārthābhidhāyīni /
GSP33nysu__3u:5211: yataḥ sāmānyata evānvitābhidhāne śaktiḥ padānāṃ nānvayaviśeṣābhidhāne /
GSP33nysu__3u:5212: ato brahmapadena sāmānyataḥ samastayogyadharmānvite brahmaṇi pratīte satyatvenānvitaṃ jñānatvenānvitamiti viśeṣānvayapratipattyarthāni satyādipadānīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:5218: na punaḥ padānyeva na padābhihitārthādīnīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5219: tatra vyākhyātāraṃ prati kuto 'yaṃ sūtrakṛto 'bhiprāya iti bhavatyeva paricodanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:5222: tathāpyadhikaraṇasiddhāntavarṇanamiṣeṇa tatra saṃkṣepato vyutpāditopapattīnāṃ prapañcāya prayatno 'yamityadoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:5224: taditi parāmṛṣṭaṃ hetuṃ darśayati- yata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5241: nacādyaṃ padaṃ sāmānyato 'nvitābhidhāyyuttaraṃ tu viśeṣata iti vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:5243: vedavākye 'pi hi kvacidbrahmapadamādyaṃ kvaciduttaramityata āha- sāmānyata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5247: ekaikaśaḥ padaiḥ sāmānyato 'nvitatayā jñāto 'rthaḥ punaḥ padāntarasannidhānāhita(śakti)
GSP33nysu__3u:5253: rūpasya hi ghaṭenābheda iti tvacā tasmingṛhīte tadapi gṛhyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:5259: ekasya siddhāvanuṣaṅgī yo 'rthaḥ siddhayati so 'dhikaraṇasiddhānto na hi sambhāvanāsiddhirityata āha- svārtha eveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5267: tadviśeṣato dharmaviśeṣeṇa anvayaḥ taduktyaiva satyādipadoktyaiva jñāyata ityanubha(vena)vasiddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:5275: sa ca yathānubhavameva svīkārya iti nātiprasaṅga kaściditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:5277: evaṃ pratijñātamanvitābhidhānamupapādya yaduktamabhihitānvayādipakṣāṇāmayuktatvaṃ tadanvitābhidhānānaṅgīkāre bādhakapradarśanamukhenopapādayati- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:5279: tathānyānyapi sarvāṇi kaḥ kuryādanvayaṃ punaḥ // MAnuv_3,2.185 //
GSP33nysu__3u:5288: uttarāṇi tvādita eva labdhasahāyāni viśeṣata evānvitābhidhāyīni /
GSP33nysu__3u:5290: anyathā yadi vākyasthāni samastāni padāni nānvitābhidhāyīni kintvananvitāneva svārthānabhidadhatīti,
GSP33nysu__3u:5295: anvayasya kathaṃ jñānaṃ śabdārthatvaṃ yadāsya na // MAnuv_3,2.187ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:5297: yadā yadyasyānvayasya śabdārthatvaṃ padābhidheyatvaṃ na syāttarhyanvayasya jñānaṃ kathaṃ na kathañcit /
GSP33nysu__3u:5299_0: tathāhi anvayajñānātpūrvabhāvitvena vādibhiraṅgīkṛtatvena vā prasaktāni tāvadetāni
GSP33nysu__3u:5299_1: padāni vā vaktā vā padairabhihitāḥ padārthā vā vākyaṃ vā vākyāntyavarṇo vā varṇamālā

GSP33nysu__3u:7552: tathāca punaraniścaya evetyata āha- dṛśyanta iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7566: asmadādibhyaḥ ko viśeṣasteṣāmityata uktaṃ yoganiṣṭhāścāmalacakṣuṣa iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7570: vasiṣṭhādayo yogardhisampannayā divyayā dṛṣṭayā paramapuruṣavartinaṃ mokṣaṃ sākṣātkurvāṇāḥ pratyakṣeṇaiva dṛśyante 'to na mokṣāniścaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7571: asmadādibhiranupalabdhatvātte na santītyata āha- niṣiddhayanta iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7577: ato viprakarṣādanupalabhyamānā na niṣeddhuṃ śakyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7580: teṣāṃ mahīyastvaṃ tu kuta ityata āha- dṛśyate ceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7582: na kevalaṃ puruṣāḥ kintu teṣāmatimāhātmyaṃ mahīyastvaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:7589: mahaiśvaryeṣu ca sārvajñāparanāmakaṃ prākāśyamiti teṣāṃ mahīyastvasiddhiriti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7591: nanu tadīyaṃ mokṣaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pareṣāṃ kutaḥ siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:7594: yadi te 'pi niṣiddhayante kiṃ noktiste niṣiddhayate // MAnuv_3,3.121ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7600: evaṃbhūtā api te yogino yadi vipralambhakā iti niṣiddhayante /
GSP33nysu__3u:7601: tadīyaṃ vākyaṃ vipralambhamūlatvena nirākriyata iti yāvat /
GSP33nysu__3u:7602: tadā te tvadabhyupagatā lokāyatācāryoktiḥ kiṃ tathaiva na niṣidhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:7606: viprakaṣarvaśādasmābhiranupalabhyamānā api yoginastanmāhātmyaṃ tadīyaṃ svapratyakṣaviṣayaṃ vākyaṃ cāsmābhiḥ kuto 'vagantavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7617: yairyogibhiruktānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa pratyakṣasaṃvādenopalabhyante te 'pīti pūrveṇānvayaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7619: varādayo 'pi taddattāḥ sadā satyā bhavanti hi // MAnuv_3,3.122ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7621: tairyogibhirdattā varāḥ śāpāśca sadāvyabhicāreṇa satyā bhavanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7623: te prasannāḥ santastavedaṃ bhadraṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā kupitāḥ santastavedamabhadraṃ bhaviṣyatīti vā yadāhustattathaiva bhavatpratyakṣeṇopalabhyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7625: pratyakṣayogyārthe bhavatu tatsaṃvādena tadīyaṃ vākyaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7627: evaṃ tarhi lokāyatācāryavacanamapi pratyakṣayogyārthe tatsaṃvādena pramāṇamastu /
GSP33nysu__3u:7629: atha manyase pratyakṣayogyārthe tāvattadīyaṃ vacanaṃ pratyakṣasaṃvādyevopalabdham /
GSP33nysu__3u:7645: na hi prayojanaṃ kiñcit paralokanivāraṇāt // MAnuv_3,3.123ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7652: adṛṣṭaṃ hi svargādāvupabhogyaṃ vā syāddehāntareṇehaiva vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:7666: vṛthāvācaṃ vṛthā hanyād yadi tasya kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,3.123cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:7671: yadi kaścittamācāryaṃ vineyaṃ vā vṛthaiva hanyāttadā taṃ prati tasya kimuttaram /
GSP33nysu__3u:7675: atastvayā niraṅkuśena kāmopabhogaḥ karaṇīya ityācāryeṇa bodhito 'ntevāsī tadīyakamanīyakāntādyapahārārthaṃ taṃ hanyādeva,
GSP33nysu__3u:7681: pratyuta svajīvanahānilakṣaṇo 'nartha eva evaṃ vineyānāmapyanyonyadhanavanitādyapahārāyaparasparavadhādāveva pravṛttiḥ na tu kāmopabhogāvasaraḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7686: svajīvanavirodhāya vadan kiṃ nāma buddhimān // MAnuv_3,3.123ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:7695: prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ kiṃ syāt tayoḥ puruṣayorapi /
GSP33nysu__3u:7708: svoktaṃ sarvaṃ pratyakṣasaṃvādena lokānubhavaṃ lokāśvāsaṃ prāpayan /
GSP33nysu__3u:7709: yaḥ svajīvanaviruddhoktitvādiviśeṣaṇo lokāyatācāryo yaścātīndriyadevoktiśrotṛtvādiviśeṣaṇo yogī tayorapi puruṣayoḥ prāmāṇye saṃśayaḥ syātkiṃ, na syādeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:7710: kintvādyasyāprāmāṇyameva dvitīyasya prāmāṇyameva niścīyata iti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:7715: idānīṃ vedenāpi taṃ siṣādhayiṣustatprāmāṇye vipratipannaṃ prati kiṃ saṃvādarahitatvādvedasyāprāmāṇyamucyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:7718: bādhitatvaditi vikalpyādye 'pi kiṃ sarvasya saṃvādo nāsti utaikadeśasyeti vikalpyādyaṃ nirācaṣṭe- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7719: ataḥ pratyakṣagamyatvād vedamātvasya ca sphuṭam // MAnuv_3,3.125ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:7727: mokṣapratipādakāni ca vedavākyāni tatra tatrodāhṛtānyeva draṣṭavyāni /
GSP33nysu__3u:7732: yadyāgamasya no mātvamakṣajasya tathā bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.126ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7734: yadi bhāgaviśeṣasya saṃvādābhāvena kṛtsnasyāpi āgamasya no mānatvam apramāṇatvamityucyate tarhi akṣajasya pratyakṣamātrasya tathā apramāṇatvaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:7736: yadi ca saṃvādarahitasyaiva vedabhāgasya no mānatvamityucyate tadāsmatsukhādiviṣayasya pratyakṣasyāprāmāṇyaṃ bhavedeveti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7740: pratyakṣaṃ svata eva pramāṇaṃ tatra kiṃ saṃvādenetyata āha- yadyakṣajasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7742: yadyakṣajasya mātvaṃ syādāgamasya kathaṃ na tat // MAnuv_3,3.126cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:7744: yadi saṃvādena vinākṣajasya svata eva pramāṇatvaṃ syāttarhi āgamasya tat svata eva prāmāṇyaṃ kathaṃ na bhavet- aviśeṣādbhavedeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:7750: yadi nirdeṣatvātstambhādiviṣayasyākṣajasya pramāṇatvaṃ syāttarhyāgamasyāpi tata eva kathaṃ na bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:7752: veda ityupakramāttathaiva vaktavye yadāgamasyeti vadati tadanenaiva nyāyena pauruṣeyāgamasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ sādhanīyamiti sūcayitum /
GSP33nysu__3u:7760: nahi vaidiko 'rthaḥ pratyakṣasiddho yena tattatra bādhakatayāvakāśaṃ labheta /
GSP33nysu__3u:7762: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāgamābhyāṃ mokṣaṃ sādhayatehāmutra phalabhogavairāgyavatāṃ yogināṃ pravṛttiḥ saphalā prekṣāvatpravṛttitvātsammatavadityanumānamapi sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7775: kiñca duḥkhasantatiśabdena duḥkhānyevocyante uta taddharmaḥ kaścit /
GSP33nysu__3u:7803: ātmā kadāciddhvastāśeṣaviśeṣaguṇo vibhutve sati kāryaviśeṣaguṇavattvāt mahāpralayāvasthāyāmākāśavaditi cāsat /
GSP33nysu__3u:7806: jīvātmapakṣīkāre 'pi saṃsāryekasvabhāvānāṃ jīvānāṃ svayamevorarīkṛtatvena tatra bādhāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:7816: vibhukāryaviśeṣaguṇavadvṛttijātitvasya hetutvānna ko 'pi doṣa iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:7825: asti mokṣo 'pi dharmeṇa yathārthajñānato 'pi ca // MAnuv_3,3.127ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7828: yadidaṃ mokṣāstitvaṃ samarthitaṃ tatsādhviti jaināḥ prāhuriti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7835: yadyapi mokṣaṃ tatsādhanaṃ cābhyupayanti jaināstathāpi tadviśeṣe vipratipadyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:7838: yadi ca svasamayaparipālanaṃ tadā dharmagrahaṇeneti pṛthaggrahaṇaṃ vyarthamiti sūcayituṃ dvayoreva grahaṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7857: etadasmākamapi sammatamityata uktamanyo hiṃsāsahito yajñādirna dharma iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:7866: anumānena vākyena ca jinasyāptatvamavadhāryāptavākyatvānumānena mokṣasādhanaṃ dharmaṃ jñānaṃ ca pratipādayato jinavākyasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ yaduktaṃ tannopapadyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7867: kuto nopapadyata ityato hetuṃ vaktumupodghātatvena pratyakṣānumānāgamasvarūpaṃ krameṇa tāvadāha- viṣayāniti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7868: viṣayān prati sthitaṃ hyakṣaṃ pratyakṣamiti gīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:7870: ā samantād gamayati dharmādharmau paraṃ padam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7877: tathā sati pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:7879: tathāpi yogyatayā viṣayāṇāṃ sambandha iti hiśabdenācaṣṭe /
GSP33nysu__3u:7892: grahavṛdṛniścigamaścetyakartari kārake bhāve vā apo vidhānāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:7915: tat nirdeṣaviṣayasannikṛṣṭanirdeṣendriyatvādikam eteṣāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ hi ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7924: tataḥ kiṃ yadyevaṃ pratyakṣādisvarūpamityata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:7925: ato 'numā kathaṃ dharmaṃ pudgalaṃ cāpi darśayet // MAnuv_3,3.132ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:7935: jino hi pramāṇenārthamupalabhya vākyaṃ praṇītavānanyathā vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:7941: jina āpto 'sskhalitavākyatvādityanumānaṃ jinadarśināṃ vākyaṃ ca pratyuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7952: āptavākyatvādityasya hi yathāśrutārthatve kvacidāptasya vipralambhakasyājñasya vākye vyabhicāraḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:7955: tatra dharmādiviṣayaṃ tattvajñānaṃ tāvanna jinasya pratyakṣajanyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:7964: anyeṣāmapratyakṣe 'rthe 'sya pratyakṣaṃ pravartata ityato na virodha iti cenna /
GSP33nysu__3u:7966: asskhalitavākyaṃ ca kvacidvā prakṛte vā sarvatra vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:7968: yaḥ kvacidasskhalitavāgasau viṣayaviśeṣa āpta iti vyāptyabhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:7991: yadyapi saptabhaṅginayo 'pi tadukto dūṣitastathāpi mokṣasādhanaṃ yatpudgaladaśarnamuktaṃ tatraiva skhalanapradarśanāyeyamuktiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8017: tasmādātmā na sukhātyantābhinna iti jino brūte /
GSP33nysu__3u:8027: sukhasya tāratamyopetatvasamarthanāya darśanāditi sākṣī tatra pramāṇatvena darśitaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8028: yastu tatrāpi vipratipannastaṃ pratyaniṣyaprasaṅgaṃ sūcayituṃ mātrābhogātirekeṇetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:8029: yadi sukhaṃ niratiśayaṃ syāttadā prekṣāvatāṃ viṣayabhogātirekopādanaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8032: nanu na sukhaṃ tāratamyopetaṃ kintu duḥkhaṃ bhāvabhūtaṃ tāratamyopetaṃ tadabhāvaśca sukham /
GSP33nysu__3u:8041: sukhasyābhāvatā kena na kenāpi pramāṇena siddhetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8053: sukhamabhāvo vastutvātsammatābhāvavaditi pramāṇasadbhāvātkathaṃ sukhasyābhāvatā kenetyuktamiti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:8057: yadi bhāvo 'pi kaścit syāt tasyaivābhāvatā kutaḥ // MAnuv_3,3.134ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8059: vastutvena sukhasyābhāvatāmanumimānasya mate yadi kaścitpadārtho bhāvo 'pi syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8063: nanu sarve 'pi padārthā abhāvā bhavantyevati nokto doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8069: evaṃ paṭādayo 'pīti dvitīyaṃ śaṅkate- yadi sarve 'pīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8072: sarve'pi padārthā anyonyābhāvāḥ syuriti yadi manyasa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8075: abhāvābhāvatā yat syāt kiṃ naśchinnaṃ tadā bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.135ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8099: bhāvatvaṃ nāma vidhirūpatvamabhāvatvaṃ nāma niṣedhatvamiti yojanā /
GSP33nysu__3u:8103: niṣedhasya niṣedho 'pi bhāva eva balād bhavet // MAnuv_3,3.136ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8105: yasmādabhāvo nāma niṣedhastasmādabhāvasyābhāva iti niṣedhasyāpi niṣedha ityuktaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8108: dṛṣṭo hi“neyaṅuvaṅsthānau'; iti niṣedhasyāstrīti niṣedho vidhiḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8113: evaṃ tarhi dravyādayo bhāvāḥ prāgabhāvādayo 'bhāvā ityanyatroktaniyamo na syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8114: ghaṭasyāpi na paṭa iti niṣedharūpatāyāḥ prāgabhāvasyāpi prameya iti vidhirūpatāyā darśanādityataḥ prāguktaṃ smārayati- prathameti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8120: yuktiviruddhatvaṃ ca darśayannātmajñānasya yanmokṣasādhanatvamuktaṃ tatkiṃ sākṣādutātmaprasādadvāreti vikalpyādyaṃ tāvannirākaroti- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8121: na ca pudgalavijñānaṃ mokṣadaṃ bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,3.137ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8123: ātmavijñānaṃ mokṣadaṃ na bhavati acetanatvātpaṭavaditi śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8131: jñānaṃ tu caitanyameva na cetanamiti prasiddhameva /
GSP33nysu__3u:8133: ātmā jñātaḥ prasanno mokṣaṃ dadātīti dvitīyaṃ dūṣayati- asvātantryāditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:8134: asvātantryāt pudgalasya jñāto 'pi sukhado na hi // MAnuv_3,3.137cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:8136: jñāta ātmāpi sukhado mokṣado na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:8144: na hi duḥkhiparijñānād duḥkhitvaṃ vinivartate // MAnuv_3,3.138ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8151: duḥkhitvādyo yadanarthavānnāsau tannivartate śakto yathā daridro dāridrayanivartane iti tātparyātharḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8152: duḥkhitvoktyāsvātantryaṃ samarthitaṃ svātantrye hi jātu na duḥkhī bhavediti /
GSP33nysu__3u:8158: svātmajñānameva ca svaduḥkhavirodhi nātmajñānamātramiti dvitīyaheturapyaprayojaka ityāśaṅkayāha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8160: dehavānapi nāduḥkhī kiṃ jñānāduttaraṃ sadā // MAnuv_3,3.138c-f //
GSP33nysu__3u:8164: tarhi jñānāduttarakālaṃ dehavānapi sadā nirantaramaduḥkhī kinna syāt, syādeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:8166: prakāśaḥ khalvandhakāravirodhitvāttannivartayan utpattyanantarameva nivartayati na tu vilambena /
GSP33nysu__3u:8175: duḥkhādikamātmatattvajñānavirodhi na bhavati bahulaṃ kālaṃ tena saha sthitatvātsammatavaditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:8178: tathāca yadanantaraṃ mokṣo 'bhilaṣṭate tajjinasya caramajñānaṃ na mokṣasādhanamātmajñānatvātprathamādijñānavat /
GSP33nysu__3u:8186: īśavādino mama mate tadicchāviśeṣānusāreṇa kālātkañcana kālamativāhya muktiḥ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:8191: sa ca cetanaḥ kāmapi kālakalpanāṃ karoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:8193: tatkalpanānusāreṇa bhavatyevāsau mukta iti na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8194: yathā brāhmaṇasya vidyācaraṇādinā prasanno 'pi prabhuścetasā kalpayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:8196: sa brāhmaṇasya vidyācaraṇādinā prasanno 'pi prabhuścetasā kalpayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:8199: evamātmajñānasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ nirākṛtya dharmasyāpi taṃ nirācaṣṭe- karmeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8209: vimataṃ karma na mokṣasādhanaṃ bhavati acetanatvātpaṭavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8214: nanvacetanatve 'pi viśiṣyaṃ karmedaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ kinna syāditi cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:8219: ekatve ca jātasyaiva janma vā kriyāṇāṃ vaiyarthyaṃ vā viramyavyāpāro vā'padyeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:8225: yathedānīṃ prathamakriyottarakālaṃ jātaṃ karmāśeṣaduḥkhavilaye mokṣasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:8238: nahi jñānodayānantaramiyataiva kāleneyantyeva karmāṇi kṛtvāpavrajyata iti niyamaḥ pramāṇavān /
GSP33nysu__3u:8253: tayaiva bandhahāniḥ syāditi kiṃ nāma dūṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,3.141 //
GSP33nysu__3u:8257: yadi ca tayā tatprītyaiva bandhahāniḥ syādityanumīyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:8267: karmādinā bhavannīśvaraprasādo 'pi guṇotkarṣādijñāne satyeveti na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:8275: kiṃ vimatā bandhahāniḥ svajñānanibandhanetyanumīyate uta paraprasādanibandhanā na bhavatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:8277: svajñānād bandhahānistu dṛśyate kasya kutracit // MAnuv_3,3.142ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:8279: dṛśyata ityetatkākvā na dṛśyata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:8287: yaduktaṃ dharmajñānayormokṣasādhanatve tadaiva mokṣaḥ syāditi tadasat /
GSP33nysu__3u:8296: ete ca dharmajñāne mokṣasādhane'; ityeṣo 'rthaḥ pramito bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:8298: evameva kalyane 'tiprasaṅga ityāśayavāndharmādisvarūpe tāvatpramāṇaṃ nāstītyāha- ahiṃsāyāśceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:8299: ahiṃsāyāśca dharmatvaṃ kena mānena gamyate // MAnuv_3,3.142cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:8308: hiṃsāyā eva dharmatvamityukte syāt kimuttaram // MAnuv_3,3.142ef //

GSP33nysu__3u:11510: atha bhedadarśanamevābhedadarśanasya bādhakaṃ kuto na bhavatītyata āha- aparīkṣiteti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11517: parīkṣāpūrvaṃ darśanaṃ prāmāṇyaniścayo yasya pratyakṣasyeti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11519: tadanena yatparīkṣayā na niścitaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānaṃ na tannimittaprāmāṇyaṃ jñānāntaraṃ bādhata iti vyāptiruktā /

GSP33nysu__3u:11528: ato na tattasya bādhakaṃ kintu vaiparītyameveti vadāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11537: purāṇavākyaṃ ca kecidbhedaṃ paśyantīti vā pratipādayatu /
GSP33nysu__3u:11541: ataḥ pramāṇābhāvānna bhedadaśarnasya prāmāṇyaniścaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11546: dvitīyābhiprāyeṇa tu bhedasya darśana iti samāsaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11548: niścitaṃ parīkṣitaṃ ca tadbhedasyadarśanaṃ ceti tathoktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11552: nniścitaprāmāṇyaṃ bhedadarśanaṃ na pratīyeta tarhi kīdṛśaṃ tatpratīyata ityata āha- sammugdhamiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11574: idameva tasya bādhakaṃ kinna syādityata āha- aparīkṣitameveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11576: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyate kenacit kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.137 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11589: nanu doṣābhāvaviṣayaṃ mahatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ tāvatkutaḥ siddhamityata āha- nirdeṣameveti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11591: nirdoṣameva rudro 'drāṅ nirdoṣaṃ taṃ purandaraḥ // MAnuv_3,4.138 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11594: iti barkuśruteścaiva sadoṣaṃ nāsya darśanam // MAnuv_3,4.139 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11603: asya parameśvarasya viṣaye mahatāṃ darśanaṃ sadoṣaṃ doṣagrāhi naiva, kintu nirdeṣameva gṛhṇātīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11605: doṣadaśarnamaparīkṣitaṃ tadabhāvadarśanaṃ tu parīkṣitametatkuta ityata āha- aviddha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11608: iti paiṅgiśrutiścaiva prāha nirdoṣatāṃ hareḥ // MAnuv_3,4.140 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11619: parīkṣādarśane naiva dṛśyo doṣo hareḥ kvacit /
GSP33nysu__3u:11635: svata eva jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ (gṛhyate) natu parīkṣādhīnam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11637: ataḥ svenaiva svayaṃ svaprāmāṇyaṃ ca siddhayati kā tatra parīkṣāpekṣeti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11641: jñānaṃ tatprāmāṇyaṃ ca sākṣiṇaiva jñāyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11642: yadi ca svataḥprāmāṇyagraho na syāttarhi na syādeva /
GSP33nysu__3u:11645: tatprāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca parīkṣāntareṇeti kathaṃ nānavasthā syāditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11659: saṃśayaśca manovṛttiviṣaye pānīyādau bhavati na punaḥ sākṣisiddhe sukhādau /
GSP33nysu__3u:11660: atastāvadeva parīkṣā yāvatsākṣigṛhīteṣu sukhādiṣvavatāra iti kuto 'navastheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11663: manovṛttiviṣaya eva saṃśayo na sākṣisiddha ityatra kiṃ kāraṇamityata āha- mānasa iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11664: mānase darśane doṣāḥ syurnavai sākṣidarśane // MAnuv_3,4.142cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11674: yathā sthāṇutayā(vadayaṃ) pratīyate sthāṇurbhavati na veti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11678: atastatsaṃśayātmakaṃ vā jāyate niścayatayā jātasya viṣaye vā āhāyarḥ saṃśayo bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11680: ato na tatsaṃśayātmakaṃ nāpi (sākṣisiddhe)tatsiddhe 'rthe saṃśaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11683: sākṣidarśane na sambhavantītyetatkuta ityata āha- sudṛḍha iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11684: sudṛḍho nirṇayo yatra jñeyaṃ tat sākṣidarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.142ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11693: sākṣidarśanaṃ ca nirṇayātmakameva bhavati na ca bādhyata ityupapāditaṃ pṛthagadhikaraṇe /
GSP33nysu__3u:11696: sākṣisiddhe 'rthe saṃśayo nāstītyuktaṃ tadanubhavārūḍhaṃ kartuṃ sākṣisiddhamarthaṃ tāvadāha- iccheti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11702: ... na kaściddhi tatra saṃśayavān kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.143cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11705: na jātu mama sukhamasti na veti saṃśayo nāpi pratīyamānamidaṃ sukhaṃ sadasadveti saṃśaya iti hiśabdenāha /
GSP33nysu__3u:11707: nahi pratītisamayamātravartini tatrānyajñānaṃ sambhavatītyata āha- yadīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11709: yat kvacid vyabhicārī syād darśanaṃ mānasaṃ hi tat // MAnuv_3,4.143ef //
GSP33nysu__3u:11711: yaddarśanaṃ kvacicchuktirajatādau viṣaye vyabhicāri bādhitaṃ syāttaccakṣurādikaraṇakaṃ manaḥpariṇatirūpameva na sākṣirūpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11719: kīdṛśasya tarhi prāmāṇyamityata āha- mana iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11721: prāmāṇyaṃ sugṛhītaṃ syāt tat parīkṣitadarśanam // MAnuv_3,4.144 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11729: yatra jñāne sugṛhītaṃ parīkṣayā niścitaṃ tatparīkṣitadarśanaṃ pramāṇamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11731: dharmijñānānumānopamānānuvyavasāyānāṃ tu prāmāṇyagrahaṇaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣamiti kecinmanyante /
GSP33nysu__3u:11736: evaṃ mānasapratyakṣādijñānaprāmāṇyagrahasya parīkṣādhīnatve 'pi sākṣiprāmāṇyagrahasya tadanapekṣatvānna parīkṣānavasthetyuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11738: sākṣivatpratyakṣādijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyagrahaḥ parīkṣānapekṣa evoktavidhayā svataḥ kinna syādityāśaṅkāṃ pariharati- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11739: na jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate // MAnuv_3,4.145ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11750: bhavatu vā jñānaṃ svaprakāśaṃ tathāpi svarūpamātra eva na tu svadharme prāmāṇye 'pi /
GSP33nysu__3u:11752: vedavākyaśravaṇe sati bāhyasya vākyārthajñānamutpadyate na vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11761: tato jñānadṛṣṭimātreṇa na jñānaprāmāṇyaṃ dṛśyata iti dvitīya evāṅgīkāryaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11762: tathāca svaprakāśajñānenaiva prāmāṇyagraha iti kathaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11763: apauruṣeyatvādiyuktibhiḥ prabodhito bāhyaḥ pratipadyate ca tatprāmāṇyamiti kathaṃ na parīkṣāpekṣatvam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11764: anyathā vaidikajñānaprāmāṇye vipratipattireva na syāt jñānasvarūpavat /
GSP33nysu__3u:11766: idamanubhavasya rajatasmaraṇasya ca bhedāgraho hi vibhramaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11776: anumeyatve 'pi jñānasya na jñānānumitimātreṇa prāmāṇyaṃ tasya dṛśyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11780: tato jñātatādimātreṇa pratīte jñāne bādhābhāvādinā prāmāṇyamanumeyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11784: idameva cāsmābhirabhidhāsyate, sarvathā parīkṣānapekṣeti tu na kṣamyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11807: yadi vṛttijñānānāmiva sākṣijñānasyāpi prāmāṇyaṃ taddarśanamātreṇa na dṛśyate tadādhikamapi kāraṇaṃ kalpayāmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11815: svaprāmāṇyaṃ sadā sākṣī paśyatyeva suniścayāt // MAnuv_3,4.146ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11825: tathāca na vilakṣaṇatvāditi yatsvataḥ prāmāṇyamiṣyaṃ tattyaktaṃ syādityata āha- jñānasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11828: jñānasya grāhakeṇa sākṣiṇaiva jñānasya mānatāyā miteḥ kāraṇātsvataḥprāmāṇyamiṣyata eveti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11829: bhavetsvataḥprāmāṇyatyāgo yadi jñānameva sākṣivedyaṃ na prāmāṇyamiti brūmaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11832: kimarthaṃ tarhi parīkṣāvaśyambhāvo 'bhyupagamyata ityata āha- doṣeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11837: jñānaṃ gṛhṇansākṣī karaṇadoṣābhāve 'sya prāmāṇyamityeva prāmāṇyaṃ niścinoti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11850: syādetadyadīyaṃ prakriyā pramāṇavatī syānna ca tadastītyata āha- ata iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11851: ato na sarvamānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11852: sākṣiṇā niścitaṃ yatra tat prāmāṇyasvalakṣaṇam // MAnuv_3,4.148 //
GSP33nysu__3u:11855: ata eva hi sarveṣāṃ jñānānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ prathamato na niścitaṃ bhavet /
GSP33nysu__3u:11856: kinnāma yatra yadā parīkṣāsahakṛtena sākṣiṇā prāmāṇyaṃ niścitaṃ bhavati tattadaiva prāmāṇyaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ prāmāṇyasvarūpamaprāmāṇyaviviktaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11858_0: yadi sākṣī doṣābhāve pramāṇametaditi prathamaṃ sammugdhaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ gṛhītvā paścājjijñāsāyāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:11858_1: satyāṃ parīkṣayā pramāṇamevetyavadhārayatītyeṣā prakriyā nāṅgīkriyeta tadānabhyastaviṣayāṇāṃ
GSP33nysu__3u:11858_2: śabdādinā jātānāṃ sarveṣāmapi jñānānāṃ prathamameva prāmāṇyamavadhāryeta /
GSP33nysu__3u:11862: na hi kaścit sukhādyeṣu saṃśayaṃ kurute janaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:11866: yasmātsukhādyeṣu kaścitsaṃśayaṃ na karoti yasmāccākhilāni vṛttijñānāni darśana eva pramāṇatayākhilo jano na niścinoti tasmātsākṣiprāmāṇyaṃ parīkṣānapekṣeṇa sākṣiṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11871: doṣābhāvādikaṃ caiva sākṣī samyak prapaśyati // MAnuv_3,4.150cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11874: svasya parīkṣāyāśca doṣābhāvaṃ prāmāṇyaṃ ca parīkṣānirapekṣaḥ sākṣyeva samyak prapaśyati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11877: tat parīkṣitamānena na doṣo viṣṇavi kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.151ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11880: tena ca bhagavati kvacidapi doṣo nāstīti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:11882: evamaparīkṣitaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ parīkṣitena nirdeṣatādarśanena bādhitaṃ na bhagavato doṣitvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaktamityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11897: yatra yadākṣajamāgamasyopajīvyaṃ tat tadā pratyakṣaviruddhārthe jātyā prabalasyāpyāgamasya mānatā nāsti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11906: laukike pratyakṣasiddhajīvādiviṣaye brahmātmakatvādibodhanarūpe vyavahāre tattvamasyādyāgamena kriyamāṇe atra āgame āgamaṃ prati pratyakṣasyopajīvyatā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11907: avatārāṇāṃ viśvādīnāṃ ca doṣadṛṣṭau pratyakṣādikaṃ pratyāgamasyopajīvyatā syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11913: anena doṣaviṣayapratyakṣavirodhādāgamasyaivāprāmāṇyaṃ kinna syāditi codyaṃ garbhasrāveṇaiva gatam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11917: āgamena hi viṣṇutvaṃ jñātvā doṣo 'tra kalpyate // MAnuv_3,4.154ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:11920: vastutaḥ kalpanaivaiṣā na pramitiritibhāvena kalpyata ityuktam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11923: tadeva na jñātavyamityata āha- na cediti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11926: yadi viṣṇutvaṃ rāmakṛṣṇādau na jñātaṃ tadā doṣagrāhiṇā pratyakṣeṇa viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti gṛhītaṃ syāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:11928: nahi devadatte devadattatvājñāne devadatto 'yamāgata ityākāraṃ jñānamutpattumarhatīti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11930: yataḥ śrīvatsakaustubhādilakṣaṇena viṣṇutvamanumāya viṣṇurdeṣavāniti pratyakṣeṇa jñāsyata ityata āha- śāstreti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11936: nanu viṣṇutvājñāne viṣṇoranyo doṣavāniti jñānena kuto bhāvyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11943: nanu yathā paṭo 'yaṃ chinno dagdho malina iti parānupajīvinā pratyakṣeṇaiva gṛhyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:11944: tathā'gamādikamanupajīvya pratyakṣeṇaiva viṣṇurdeṣavāniti jñāsyata ityata āha- neti //
GSP33nysu__3u:11945: na viṣṇordeṣavattve hi pratyakṣaṃ vartate svataḥ // MAnuv_3,4.155cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:11952: yathā pañcapalaparimito 'yaṃ paṭo malina iti jñānamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11956: viṣṇurayaṃ doṣavāniti vā viṣṇoranyo 'yaṃ doṣavāniti vā kaścidayaṃ doṣavāniti vā /
GSP33nysu__3u:11962: nahi vastuvṛttisahitaṃ yatkiñcijjñānaṃ vivakṣitaviśe(ṣaṇaṃ sā)ṣaṃ sādhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:11970: sa ca sarvarūpopetasya viṣṇornirdeṣatvaṃ pratipādayatīti tadvirodhādapramāṇameva doṣaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:11979: kecittatkālavartinaḥ puruṣā bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣānpaśyantītyatrārthe 'smākaṃ kiṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33nysu__3u:11994: tatpurāṇavākyaṃ taddoṣadarśanaṃ kiṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ pramāṇatayā manyate,
GSP33nysu__3u:12000: bhagavadrūpeṣu doṣagrāhiṇīṃ pratītiṃ pramāṇatayā pratipādayatpurāṇavākyaṃ doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:12001: na hi sambhavati tadgrāhiṇaḥ prāmāṇyamaṅgīkaroti nāṅgīkaroti ca taditi /
GSP33nysu__3u:12002: doṣasadbhāvaṃ manyamānaṃ ca tatprāgudāhṛtayā śrutyaiva viruddhayata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12003: purāṇavākyasya śrutiviruddhatve ko doṣa ityata āha- purāṇasyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12007: yataḥ kenacitkāraṇena kañcidarthaṃ buddhisthīkṛtya vākyaṃ prayuñjmahe /
GSP33nysu__3u:12009: purāṇavākyasya ca veda eva mūlaṃ kuta ityata āha- naceti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12020: ataḥ pariśeṣādveda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti siddham /
GSP33nysu__3u:12022: tadvirodhe kathaṃ mānaṃ tat tatra ca bhaviṣyati // MAnuv_3,4.157cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12029: nanvīśvarapraṇītānāṃ purāṇānāṃ tadīyaṃ nijaṃ jñānameva mūlaṃ na vedaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12037: tathāpi veda eva purāṇasyopajīvya iti katham /
GSP33nysu__3u:12048: akṣajaṃ kathameva bhavediti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇatayābhilaṣitārthe nodbhāvayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33nysu__3u:12051: yadyevaṃ devadattādibhramaḥ kiṃ nākṣajaṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.158cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:12064: dṛśyate hyupajīvyasyāpīdaṃ rajatamiti jñānasyopajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānena bādha iti cet /
GSP33nysu__3u:12067: pratiṣedhātmakaṃ tu nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvakamiti vā,
GSP33nysu__3u:12076: upajīvye 'śodhite parīkṣayāpramāṇādavivikte upajīvakena bādhite na doṣaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12086: astyevedaṃ rajataṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti jñānayorupajīvyopajīvakabhāva upajīvyasyopajīvakena bādhaśca /
GSP33nysu__3u:12089: parīkṣayā śodhitamupajīvyaṃ virodhyupajīvakaṃ bādhate svayaṃ tena na bādhyata iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12094: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tu na śodhitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12109: ātyantikaparīkṣaiva bādhakatvopayoginī bhavatu kimupajīvyatvenetyapi na vācyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12119: yadyapyekamevedaṃ rajatamiti jñānaṃ tathāpi viṣayopādhivaśād vibhāgam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12123: sarvaṃ jñānaṃ dharmiṇi pramāṇaṃ prakāre tu viparyaya iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12133: asminpakṣe yadupajīvyaṃ na tadupajīvakena bādhyate yacca bādhyate na tadupajīvyamityato nedamasmadīyaniyamabhaṅgasyodāharaṇamiti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12140: yaḥ sarvajña ityādīnāṃ tattvamasyādīnāṃ ca kathamupajīvyopajīvakabhāva iti vaktavyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:12143: naca prāptiṃ vinā pratiṣedho 'stīti prāptirūpaṃ yaḥ sarvajña ityādikamupajīvyam,
GSP33nysu__3u:12149: yadbādhyate sārvajñādikaṃ na tadupajīvyamiti na kaścidvirodha iti /
GSP33nysu__3u:12157: tatkathamityataḥ prathamapakṣe tāvadvaiṣamyaṃ darśayati- suparīkṣita iti //
GSP33nysu__3u:12160: prathamapramāṇe suparīkṣite sati na caivamiti sambandhaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:12162: idaṃ rajatamiti jñānamupajīvyamapyaparīkṣitatvādupajīvakena nedaṃ rajatamati jñānena bādhyate /

GSP33nysu__3u:13422: iha kramāditi pratijñāyāṃ viśeṣaṇaprakṣepeṇa bhagavadbhaktabhakteḥ kartavyatvaṃ tattāratamyasya cāvaśyakatvaṃ siddhayati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13431: prītidaiva hareryasmād bhaktiḥ sā svopagā yathā // MAnuv_3,4.235 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13448: tadetajjñānakarmādiphalaṃ kiṃ prerakatvāddevānāṃ bhavati uta kartṛtvāddevadattasyeti saṃśaye prathamasūtreṇa devānāmeveti pūrvapakṣayitvā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13450: ityekadeśimatena siddhāntamabhidhāya“sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat';
GSP33nysu__3u:13452: tatra devānāṃ jñānādiphalamiti pūrvapakṣāṃśo grāhya eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13461: devadattenānuṣṭhitasya jñānādeḥ phalaṃ devānāṃ bhavatītyekā pratijñā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13462: bhavacca tatkrameṇaiva na tu sāmyena vaiparītyena veti dvitīyā /
GSP33nysu__3u:13464: svātantryatāratamyena phalaṃ hi phalināṃ bhavet // MAnuv_3,4.236cd //
GSP33nysu__3u:13466: phalināṃ phalabhājāṃ, svātantryatāratamyena svāmyatāratamyānusāreṇaiva hi phalena bhāvyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13469: anena prathamapratijñāyāṃ svātantryahetuḥ sūcito bhavati yaḥ sūtre svāmipadenoktaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13471: tathāpi phalaprāptāvuktasya svāmitvahetoḥ sāmarthyena prāptamiti tadapyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13472: yadi svātantryāddevadattānuṣṭhitajñānādiphalaṃ devānāṃ syāttarhi tadanuṣṭhitamithyājñānādiphalamapi prasajyetāviśeṣādityata āha- aśubhaṃ tviti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13475: ājñayā cānyagaṃ naiva bhogāya bhavati kvacit // MAnuv_3,4.237 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13477: anyagamaśubhaṃ tveṣāṃ devānāṃ kvacidapi bhogāya na bhavati /
GSP33nysu__3u:13479: hareḥ prītito 'śubhe 'pyeṣāṃ svātantryādbhagavatprasādena maitadasmānprāpaditi nivāraṇe teṣāṃ sāmarthyasadbhāvāt /
GSP33nysu__3u:13481: anyagamiti vadatā svagataṃ tu bhavatīti sūcitam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13488: anena“puṇyamevāmuṃ gacchati na ha vai devānpāpaṃ gacchati'; iti śrutimupādatte /
GSP33nysu__3u:13489: amuṃ saptānnavidyopāsanena prerakatayā parapurapraveśinaṃ parakṛtaṃ puṇyamevāpnoti na pāpam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13500: kāstā yuktaya ityatastā darśayitumāgamavākyaṃ paṭhati- upasaneti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13503: prerayanti hi te jīvān puṇyapāpeṣu nityaśaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13506: haripūjeti coddeśāt kathaṃ na śubhamāpnuyuḥ // MAnuv_3,4.241 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13516: kiñca te devā vāsudevājñayaiva na tu svecchayā tattatkṛtapūrvakarmānusārata eva /
GSP33nysu__3u:13517: ata evārāgadveṣato rāgadveṣau vinaiva nityaśo jīvānpuṇyapāpeṣu prerayanti hi yasmāttasmātkathaṃ doṣānavāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13519: pāpādipreraṇena devānāmaśubhaṃ na bhavatītyeva kevalaṃ na,
GSP33nysu__3u:13521: kiñca svavihitaparapreraṇe haripūjeyamiti coddeśātkathaṃ devā na śubhamāpanuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13531: devā eva hi devānāṃ viśiṣṭā viniyāmakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.243ab //
GSP33nysu__3u:13542: tatrāpi tāratamye ko heturityata uktam- dravyeti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13544: devānāmanyagaṃ cāpi teṣu yad brahmaṇo 'dhikam // MAnuv_3,4.244 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13547: dravyāṇīndriyādīni teṣu svātantryaṃ dravyasvātantryaṃ vijñānaprayatnau dharmādyutpānanimitte /
GSP33nysu__3u:13559: yasya cā'vāpādau jñānaprayatnādhikyaṃ tasya phalādhikyaṃ dṛśyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13575: krameṇaiva yathāśakti yathā ye ye prayojakāḥ // MAnuv_3,4.247 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13576: prerakā api pāpānāṃ na devāḥ pāpamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13577: iti prakāśikāyāṃ hi provāca harirañjasā // MAnuv_3,4.248 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13581: tasya vivaraṇaṃ ye ye yathā prayojakāstathā tatheti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13585: oṃ sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat oṃ //
GSP33nysu__3u:13587: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate | BBs_3,4.45 |
GSP33nysu__3u:13588: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat | BBs_3,4.47 |
GSP33nysu__3u:13589: yadyapyevaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca mahat phalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13590: śubhāśubhebhya evañca kartuśca syād yathoditam // MAnuv_3,4.249 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13592: evamuktaprakāreṇa yadyapi śubhāśubhebhyo jñānādibhyo bhavatphalaṃ surāṇāṃ ca daityānāṃ ca bhavatītyupapāditam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13599: kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāre yadu kiñcemāḥ prajā iti sāvadhāraṇaśrutivirodha ātreyavacanavirodhaśca syādityata uktam- mahaditi //
GSP33nysu__3u:13602: kutaḥ kartuḥ phalāṅgīkāra ityata āha- yathoditamita //
GSP33nysu__3u:13610: kartuḥ śubhāśubhaphalasadbhāvādeva mānuṣottamamārabhya devaparyantā daityaparyantāśca nirayādyupabhogina iti yujyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13614: iti tattvavivekoktaṃ svayaṃ bhagavatā vacaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.251 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13638: jñānadānaṃ kimāviṣkāreṇa kāryamutānāviṣkāreṇeti saṃśaye pūrvavadatrāpi pūrvapakṣamatyantaheyatvābhāvātprapañcenāṃha- jñānadā apīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13642: na kevalaṃ śiṣyāḥ kintu jñānadā ācāryā api jñānaphalamāpnuyuḥ /
GSP33nysu__3u:13644: ācāryā ityenenaiva siddhe jñānadā iti vacanaṃ jñānadāneneti jñāpanārtham /
GSP33nysu__3u:13649: devāḥ sahasraguṇitaṃ kramāt tasmād yathottaram // MAnuv_3,4.253 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13656: tataḥ paramagurorapare guravaḥ svaśiṣyaphalāpekṣayā sārdhaṃ tāvat adhyardhaṃ phalamāpanuvanti /
GSP33nysu__3u:13677: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā māmevaiṣyatyasaṃśayaḥ // MAnuv_3,4.255 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13679: bhavitā na ca me tasmādanyaḥ priyataro bhuvi /
GSP33nysu__3u:13683: yata evaṃ jñānadānaṃ tatsampradāyapravartanaṃ ca mahāphalam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13684: ato bahūnāṃ grahaṇāyāviṣkāreṇa jñānadānaṃ kāryamiti prāpte siddhāntamāha- evamapīti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13688: tathāpi nāviṣkāreṇa kāryaṃ kuta ityata āha- pātramiti //
GSP33nysu__3u:13708: jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktaṃ muktiścehaiva labhyate // MAnuv_3,4.257 //
GSP33nysu__3u:13710: prārabdhasya karmaṇo 'virodhenaiva jñānaṃ dṛṣṭaphalaṃ proktamiti prathamādhikaraṇatātparyam /
GSP33nysu__3u:13711: dṛṣṭaṃ ca tatphalaṃ ceti dṛṣṭaphalam śravaṇādisampūrtyanantarameva jñānamutpadyate /
